core_meaning: Square between Uranus and Mercury drives friction/work. Uranus: . Mercury: analysis, communication, commerce, learning, tech. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Negotiation, analytics, documentation, skilling. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Trading, freelancing, multi-stream income, contracts. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Nervous system, breath, routine mobility. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Uranus: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

hi.title: Uranus Square Mercury (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Uranus और Mercury का Square — ऊर्जा friction/work के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
